definition: Bulgaria/Bulgarian/abbr. for 保加利亞|保加利亚[Bao3 jia1 li4 ya4]
to defend/to protect/to keep/to guarantee/to ensure/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)

to cover/to encase/cover/sheath/to overlap/to interleave/to model after/to copy/formula/harness/loop of rope/(fig.) to fish for/to obtain slyly/classifier for sets, collections/bend (of a river or mountain range, in place names)/tau (Greek letter Ττ)

sentences.chinese: 發明了老二皮的保險套？

sentences.english: When you clean off the slate, take care not to break it.
sentences.chinese: 在帶保險套時小心不要被手指甲劃破。

sentences.english: Do not use birth control pills; use a condom without spermicide instead.
sentences.chinese: 不要使用避孕丸，以不含殺精劑的保險套取代。

sentences.english: Condoms or a vasectomy are still the only male contraceptive choices.
sentences.chinese: 男性避孕目前僅能靠保險套或輸精管結紮手術。

sentences.english: A young couple with a box of condoms proceeded to do the wild thing.
sentences.chinese: 一對年輕情侶拿著一盒保險套準備瘋狂的翻雲覆雨。

sentences.english: Smoke-old woman told her friends can buy condoms in pharmacies .
sentences.chinese: 抽菸的老女人告訴她的朋友可以在藥房買到保險套。

definition: a fish that escaped the net (idiom)/(fig.) sb or sth that slips through the net
spendthrift and foolish/sb with more money than sense
lit. bashing sideways and colliding straight on (idiom); to push through shoving and bumping/to barge/to charge around violently
